Uses of Class
ej.microui.io.DisplayFont

Packages that use DisplayFont
ej.microui.io   
 

Uses of DisplayFont in ej.microui.io
 

Methods in ej.microui.io that return DisplayFont
static DisplayFont[] DisplayFont.getAllFonts()
          Returns an array containing all available DisplayFonts in the system.
static DisplayFont DisplayFont.getDefaultFont()
          Returns the default font for all Displays.
This method may return null if no font is declared in the system.
 DisplayFont GraphicsContext.getFont()
          Returns the current font.
static DisplayFont DisplayFont.getFont(int identifier, int height, int style)
          Returns a DisplayFont matching the requested characteristics as close as possible.

Font is requested by specifying the required identifier, height and style.
 

Methods in ej.microui.io with parameters of type DisplayFont
 void GraphicsContext.setFont(DisplayFont font)
          Sets the font for subsequent text operations.
